resources.string:
"About the app: "
DnnAndroidClient is a part of a student project in distributed deep learning " "made for the NSSL lab at the EE faculty at the Technion institute. " "Any android connected to the server running the app contributes to a distributed network. " "This network preforms model training for image recognition. " "The deep learning library driving the app is the open source 'tiny-dnn' library. " "DNN stands for "Deep Neural Network"." "
" "
About us:" "
We're a couple of students from the EE faculty in the Technion institute. " "We've taken a project within the NSSL lab. " "Our supervisor was Roman K." "
That's it!!" "
" "
Version:" "
1.02" "
" "
Links:" "
NSSL lab:" "
http://nssl.eew.technion.ac.il" "
tiny-dnn on github:" "
https://github.com/tiny-dnn/tiny-dnn"
